body.name: Ninja DZ071 Foodi 6-in-1 DualZone FlexBasket Air Fryer with 7-QT MegaZone & Basket Divider, Large Proteins & Full Meals, Smart Finish Cook 2 Foods 2 Ways, Large Capacity, Air Fry, Bake & More, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 10 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 10 mins
features: FLEXBASKET: Use the divider to cook with two 3.5 qt baskets for foods that require different cooking times or temps or remove it to have 1 MegaZone for full 7 qt capacity.
7 QT MEGAZONE: Unlocks the ability to cook larger proteins and meals that feed your whole family all in one basket.
DUALZONE TECHNOLOGY: Eliminate back-to-back cooking. Cook 2 foods 2 ways with Smart Finish or sync settings across both zones with Match Cook for full 7 qt capacity.

FAMILY-SIZED CAPACITY: This 7 qt large air fryer is perfect for families or entertaining. Fit up to 2 lbs of air fried ingredients in each 3.5 QT basket or cook a 4-lb pork roast and veggies in the 7 qt MegaZone.
6-in-1 VERSATILITY: Save money and counter space with an appliance that does more than just air fry. Choose from 6 functions: Air Fry, Air Broil, Bake, Roast, Reheat and Dehydrate.
GUILT-FREE AIR FRIED FAVORITES: Air fry with up to 75% less fat than traditional frying methods (tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries).

AIR BROIL FOR A CRISPY FINISH: Add a crispy finish to all of your favorite foods—the BROIL setting exposes the top side of your food to a high temperature of 450°F to quickly char vegetables, brown proteins, or melt cheese.
FASTER AND EVEN COOKING: Spend more time with family and less time in the kitchen. 2 heating fans work together to help cook a whole meal 40% faster than your traditional oven.
EASY TO CLEAN: The 7 qt air fryer basket and crisper plates are nonstick and dishwasher safe.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: 7-QT FlexBasket, removable divider, 2 nonstick crisper plates, chef-tested recipe book with 20 recipes and cooking charts.
body.description: Meet the Ninja Foodi DualZone FlexBasket Air Fryer with 7-qt MegaZone. With the MegaZone, you can now cook larger proteins or entire meals that feed your whole family all in one basket. Insert the basket divider to cook with two 3.5 qt baskets or remove it to cook in 1 MegaZone for full 7-qt capacity. Eliminate back-to-back cooking with Dual Zone Technology. Use Smart Finish to cook 2 foods, 2 ways that finish cooking at the same time, or sync the settings across both zones with Match Cook. Plus, it features 6 cooking functions (air fry, air broil, roast, bake, reheat, dehydrate) so no matter what you’re craving, you can make it all in this 7 qt air fryer. Then, when you’re done cooking, cleanup is a breeze with nonstick and dishwasher safe crisper plates and basket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a game changer
reviews.reviewText: My air fryer has been a game-changer in my kitchen! It consistently produces perfectly crispy and delicious results with minimal oil, making it a healthier alternative to traditional frying. The versatility of this appliance is impressive – from fries to chicken wings, it handles a variety of dishes flawlessly. The easy-to-use controls and efficient cooking times have streamlined my meal preparation. Cleaning is a breeze too, thanks to its removable, dishwasher-safe components. If you're looking for a convenient and efficient way to achieve that crispy texture without the guilt, this air fryer is a must-have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I have another Ninja air fryer that is two completely separate compartments. I love that because I can cook different foods, but this one is even better because it allows us to cook with the entire space or split it for different foods. It works just as well as my first one and we use it for everything. Fast, easy, and turns out great every time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Headline: Kitchen Magic!My wife and I stumbled upon this air fryer gem, and it has truly transformed our cooking game! Without mentioning names, it's become the unsung hero in our kitchen.This appliance is a dream for couples like us – compact yet mighty. It's like a wizard in the kitchen, making everything from crispy toast to succulent chicken tenders. Goodbye, toaster oven; you've been replaced!The dual-zone feature is fantastic; we can cook two different things simultaneously without any flavor mishaps. The basket divider is a game-changer – no more compromises on what to cook. It's like having a mini-kitchen brigade right at home.The 7-QT MegaZone is a spacious marvel. Roasting almonds? Perfect. Grilled cheese? A breeze. Baked chicken tenders? Mouth-watering results every time.Cleanup is a cinch, and the sleek design blends seamlessly with our kitchen aesthetics. It's a kitchen revolution without the fuss.In conclusion, this air fryer is a kitchen superstar, and we can't imagine our cooking routine without it. If you're looking to upgrade your kitchen without breaking the bank, this is the one for you. Happy cooking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I love the flexibility of this air fryer - being able to make two meals at the same time or one large meal. It is a fairly large appliance, so keep that in mind for storing when not in use. Very easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t think twice! Best purchase! Very happy with this air fryer’s dual capability! Makes cooking a breeze!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband cooks his own dinner!
reviews.reviewText: We have another air fryer, but it was smaller and the controls were complicated. Got this one on the Black Friday sale, and it is so much better than the one we had before.It is super easy to use! I wondered if we’d really use the two zones, and we use them all the time.The other night my husband made a steak on one side and cauliflower and tots on the other….and they both got done at the same time. The steak was fantastic—-and I don’t mean for cooking it in an air fryer. It was excellent.Top: we put non-stick aluminum foil under our food which makes cleaning even easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not sure how, but somehow all these years hearing about air frying. And once you get one, you may never cook differently ever again.It’s the new but actually health, microwave. Every house should have one, and although most regular stove/ovens incorporate it, it’s not the same as something like this. We have both.This Ninja is the perfect size for 4 people. Things cook so fast, so even, so perfect, and always consistent, re discover food again. And, aside from some simple foot prep to preference, you do not have to do anything. Parts are dishwasher safe and easy to self clean too. Zero negative. The flex/time/zone thing is so awesome totally changed abilities. You can do a roast or main protein with a bed of anything, mixture of anything, perfect every time. Just buy it!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's The Best!
reviews.reviewText: I love my Ninja Air Fryer! It's the best kitchen appliance I've ever owned. I use it almost every day to cook everything from chicken and fish to vegetables and fries. It's so easy to use and the food always comes out perfectly cooked.I love that it has two separate baskets, so I can cook two different foods at the same time. This is perfect for busy weeknights when I don't have time to cook two separate meals. I can just throw everything in the air fryer and let it do its work.This is also very easy to clean. The baskets and crisper plates are all dishwasher safe, so cleanup is a breeze.Overall, I'm extremely happy with my air fryer. It's a versatile and convenient kitchen appliance that makes cooking easy and enjoyable. I also bought this to replace my six year old air fryer (that was also a Ninja) so I am confident that this will last me many years as well.
Excelente servicio, cumplió con mis espectativas
